app_code like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>

<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and process_definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionName??> and process_definition_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionName)}' </#if>

<#-- 查询运行中的流程实例 --> select distinct RES.ID_ id, RES.REV_ rev, RES.PROC_INST_ID_ instance_id, RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ process_definition_id,
